Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I receive phone calls through WiFi on an Android phone?  I have an unlocked Nexus One.  I barely use the voice function, mostly just use data.  However, I'd like to have the voice function just in case.  Is it possible to use something else (possibly VOIPish) to replace the voice plan that I am currently paying?  Perhaps Skype, or Google Voice or something else.  Has anyone had an experience with this?Thanks
Title: Is it possible to have a phone without a voice plan?

history.Text: I have an unlocked Nexus One.  I barely use the voice function, mostly just use data.  However, I'd like to have the voice function just in case.  Is it possible to use something else (possibly VOIPish) to replace the voice plan that I am currently paying?  Perhaps Skype, or Google Voice or something else.  Has anyone had an experience with this?Thanks
Is it possible to have a phone without a voice plan?
